sentences.en: Fewer than forty per cent voted— the threshold for results to be valid.
sentences.cn: 投票的人不到40%——投票结果无效。

sentences.en: He stopped at the threshold of the bedroom.
Here she is on the threshold of womanhood.
I'll never cross the threshold of your house again.
sentences.cn: 我再也不进你的家门了.

sentences.en: Nothing happens until the excitatory stimulus exceeds a certain'threshold'value.
sentences.cn: 兴奋性刺激超过某一临界值以前毫无反应.

sentences.en: She opened the door and stepped across the threshold.
She stood hesitating on the threshold.
Short of that threshold, Egypt was free to consult its own interests.
sentences.cn: 只要不迈这一步, 埃及可以自由地考虑自己的利益.

sentences.en: Sorting mail is not a job for people with a low boredom threshold.
sentences.cn: 分拣邮件不适合那些不太能忍受乏味工作的人.

sentences.en: The body of a neuron. Acts approximately as a linear threshold element.
sentences.cn: 神经元的本体, 其作用近似于一种线性阀值器件.

sentences.en: The bride was carried over the threshold.
The creature is on the threshold of extinction.
The lower curve marks the exclusion threshold for data pairs.
sentences.cn: 下部曲线标志出对数据对的排除域.

sentences.en: The sound was so loud it was on the threshold of pain.
sentences.cn: 声音大得开始使人无法忍受.

sentences.en: To check this, we turn down the threshold level.
sentences.cn: 为了检验这一点, 我们把阀值调低.

sentences.en: To cross the threshold is not difficult, but mastery is another question.
sentences.cn: 入门不难, 深造不易.

sentences.en: We are on the threshold of a new era in astronomy.
sentences.cn: 我们很快就将迎来天文学的新纪元。

trans.tran_cn: 门槛，入口，开始，阈，[物理学]阈值；阀值；临界值，<英>级限协定，[航空学]跑道入口
trans.tran_en: the entrance to a room or building, or the area of floor or ground at the entrance
